00070 // Description :
00071 // 
00072 int Champ_Fonc_Face::fixer_nb_valeurs_nodales(int nb_noeuds)
00073 {
00074   assert(nb_noeuds == zone_vdf().nb_faces());
00075   const MD_Vector& md = zone_vdf().md_vector_faces();
00076 // HACK (le meme que dans Champ_Face.cpp)
00077   int old_nb_comp = nb_compo_;
00078   nb_compo_ = 1;
00079   creer_tableau_distribue(md);
00080   nb_compo_ = old_nb_comp;
00081   return nb_noeuds;
00082 }

00103 
00104 Champ_base& Champ_Fonc_Face::affecter_(const Champ_base& ch)
00105 {
00106   const DoubleTab& v = ch.valeurs();
00107   DoubleTab& val = valeurs();
00108   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF = la_zone_VDF.valeur();
00109   int nb_faces = zone_VDF.nb_faces();
00110   const IntVect& orientation = zone_VDF.orientation();
00111   int ori, n0, n1;
00112 
00113   if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,ch))
00114     {
00115       for (int num_face=0; num_face<nb_faces; num_face++)
00116         val(num_face) = v(0,orientation(num_face));
00117     }
00118   else if ( (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme_Morceaux,ch))
00119             || (sub_type(Champ_Don_lu,ch)) )
00120     {
00121       int ndeb_int = zone_VDF.premiere_face_int();
00122       const IntTab& face_voisins = zone_VDF.face_voisins();
00123       int num_face;
00124 
00125       for (num_face=0; num_face<ndeb_int; num_face++)
00126         {
00127           ori = orientation(num_face);
00128           n0 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00129           if (n0 != -1)
00130             val(num_face) = v(n0,ori);
00131           else
00132             val(num_face) = v(face_voisins(num_face,1),ori);
00133         }
00134 
00135       for (num_face=ndeb_int; num_face<nb_faces; num_face++)
00136         {
00137           ori = orientation(num_face);
00138           n0 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00139           n1 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00140           val(num_face) = 0.5*(v(n0,ori)+v(n1,ori));
00141         }
00142     }
00143   else
00144     {
00145 // int ndeb_int = zone_VDF.premiere_face_int();
00146 // const IntTab& face_voisins = zone_VDF.face_voisins();
00147       DoubleTab positionX(zone_VDF.nb_faces_X() ,dimension);
00148       DoubleVect U(zone_VDF.nb_faces_X());
00149       DoubleTab positionY(zone_VDF.nb_faces_Y() ,dimension);
00150       DoubleVect V(zone_VDF.nb_faces_Y());
00151       DoubleTab positionZ(zone_VDF.nb_faces_Z() ,dimension);
00152       DoubleVect W(zone_VDF.nb_faces_Z());
00153       const DoubleTab& xv=zone_VDF.xv();
00154       int nbx=0;
00155       int nby=0;
00156       int nbz=0;
00157       int num_face, k;
00158 
00159       for (num_face=0; num_face<nb_faces; num_face++)
00160         {
00161           ori = orientation(num_face);
00162           switch(ori)
00163             {
00164             case 0:
00165               for(k=0; k<dimension; k++)
00166                 positionX(nbx, k)=xv(num_face, k);
00167               nbx++;
00168               break;
00169             case 1:
00170               for(k=0; k<dimension; k++)
00171                 positionY(nby, k)=xv(num_face, k);
00172               nby++;
00173               break;
00174             case 2:
00175               for(k=0; k<dimension; k++)
00176                 positionZ(nbz, k)=xv(num_face, k);
00177               nbz++;
00178               break;
00179             }
00180         }
00181 
00182       ch.valeur_aux_compo(positionX, U, 0);
00183       ch.valeur_aux_compo(positionY, V, 1);
00184       if(dimension == 3)
00185         ch.valeur_aux_compo(positionZ, W, 2);
00186       nbx=nby=nbz=0;
00187       for (num_face=0; num_face<nb_faces; num_face++)
00188         {
00189           ori = orientation(num_face);
00190           switch(ori)
00191             {
00192             case 0:
00193               val(num_face) = U(nbx++);
00194               break;
00195             case 1:
00196               val(num_face) = V(nby++);
00197               break;
00198             case 2:
00199               val(num_face) = W(nbz++);
00200               break;
00201             }
00202         }
00203     }
00204   return *this;
00205 }
00206 
00207 DoubleVect& Champ_Fonc_Face::valeur_aux_compo(const DoubleTab& positions,
00208                                               DoubleVect& tab_valeurs,
00209                                               int ncomp) const
00210 {
00211   const Zone& mazone=zone_dis_base().zone();
00212   IntVect les_polys(positions.dimension(0));
00213   mazone.chercher_elements(positions, les_polys);
00214   return valeur_aux_elems_compo(positions, les_polys, tab_valeurs, ncomp);
00215 }
